Summary: Hovering, Pulsing 3 Colors of Light Over Tree-line
divs: sighting detailsat 10:14 pm eastern time, on tuesday, august 19th, 2008. a friend and myself witnessed this object hovering over the tree line to the north of the lake (smoke lake, in dwight ontario). it was pulsing blue, red, and white as well as hovering. while on his dock we noticed it for aprox. 10 minuets, and returned inside the cottage. there are no cellular telephone towers (near that location), helicopters, or aircraft around at the time. this is a heavily forested area in northern ontario (algonquin park). it is not to be confused as a star or planet. it has not been seen again. it is my belief it was a ufo but my friend speculates it was a star, contrary to the fact he says he hasn't seen it again. we first noticed the object because of the silence, lack of aircraft\cellular tower, and the change of light. it was round, and just hovered. it hasn't been seen again.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dwight
This sighting has never been favorited.
